game.name: Super Shadow Break : Showdown! NINJA VS The Three KAIJUs

game.shortDescription: Super Shadow Break: Showdown! NINJA VS The Three KAIJUs is a "block-breaking ninja action game" that combines block-breaking and 2D action game. Use your Ninjutsu and to face off against evil NINJAs and powerful KAIJUs!
